    • 方法详细资料

      • encode

        byte[] encode(long transactionData)
       throws org.fisco.bcos.sdk.jni.common.JniException
        Tars encode based on TransactionData
        参数:
        transactionData - transaction data
        返回:
        encoded transaction
        抛出:
        org.fisco.bcos.sdk.jni.common.JniException - throw when encode transaction error

      • encodeAndSignBytes

        byte[] encodeAndSignBytes(long transactionData,
                          CryptoKeyPair cryptoKeyPair,
                          int attribute)
                   throws org.fisco.bcos.sdk.jni.common.JniException
        Tars encode and sign based on TransactionData
        参数:
        transactionData - data to be encoded
        cryptoKeyPair - keypair
        attribute - transaction attribute, see more in TransactionAttribute
        返回:
        encoded and signed transaction byte array
        抛出:
        org.fisco.bcos.sdk.jni.common.JniException - throw when encode transaction error

      • encodeAndSign

        java.lang.String encodeAndSign(long transactionData,
                               CryptoKeyPair cryptoKeyPair,
                               int attribute)
                        throws org.fisco.bcos.sdk.jni.common.JniException
        Tars encode and sign based on TransactionData
        参数:
        transactionData - data to be encoded
        cryptoKeyPair - keypair
        attribute - transaction attribute, see more in TransactionAttribute
        返回:
        encoded and signed transaction hexed String
        抛出:
        org.fisco.bcos.sdk.jni.common.JniException - throw when encode transaction error

      • encodeAndHashBytes

        byte[] encodeAndHashBytes(long transactionData)
                   throws org.fisco.bcos.sdk.jni.common.JniException
        Tars encode and hash based on TransactionData
        参数:
        transactionData - data to be encoded
        返回:
        encoded and hashed transaction byte array
        抛出:
        org.fisco.bcos.sdk.jni.common.JniException - throw when encode transaction error

      • encodeToTransactionBytes

        byte[] encodeToTransactionBytes(long transactionData,
                                byte[] hash,
                                SignatureResult result,
                                int attribute)
                         throws org.fisco.bcos.sdk.jni.common.JniException
        Tars encode transactionData to Transaction bytes
        参数:
        transactionData - raw transaction data
        hash - transaction hash
        result - transaction signature
        attribute - transaction attribute, see more in TransactionAttribute
        返回:
        encoded bytes
        抛出:
        org.fisco.bcos.sdk.jni.common.JniException - throw when encode transaction error

      • encodeToTransactionBytes

        byte[] encodeToTransactionBytes(long transactionData,
                                SignatureResult result,
                                int attribute)
                         throws org.fisco.bcos.sdk.jni.common.JniException
        Tars encode transactionData to Transaction bytes
        参数:
        transactionData - raw transaction data
        result - transaction signature
        attribute - transaction attribute, see more in TransactionAttribute
        返回:
        encoded bytes
        抛出:
        org.fisco.bcos.sdk.jni.common.JniException - throw when encode transaction error
